subject: Publish Your Article in Peer Reviewed International Journal (Volume 05 - Issue 09)
body:
*International Journal of* *Advanced Research in Engineering & Management (IJAREM)* We Publish Research Papers *(ISSN: 2456-2033)* *Dear Researcher,* *International Journal of Advanced Research in Engineering & Management (IJAREM) *is an International peer reviewed, open access, Engineering and Science Journal promoting the discovery, innovation, advancement and dissemination of basic and transitional knowledge in engineering, science and related disciplines. We aim to revolutionize industry by promoting legitimate and effective research. We welcome original research articles/manuscripts as long as their research questions are important, new, and relevant to general readers and their designs are appropriate and robust. *IJAREM provides individual hard copy of certificates to all authors on demand at their postal address after online publication.* Please ensure submitted articles conform to the internationally accepted criteria and are prepared in line with *IJAREM* Author Guidelines. Every research article published in the (IJAREM) is immediately accessible on to everyone. *Important dates for Sep 2019, Volume 05 - Issue 09* *Last date of paper submission:* *20 Sep 2019* *Notification of Acceptance* *Within 03-04 Days* *Publication date:* *Within 05-07 Days after registration* *Why publishing with The IJAREM?* All articles published in the journals are open access: Universally accessible online without charge. Easy submission and peer-review makes the whole process of publishing your article simple and efficient. High visibility for your work: Anyone with internet access can read or your download. Professional formatting and reviewing meets the standards expected by authors and worldwide research community. *IJAREM* index all published papers in worldwide indexing (Google Scholar, Ulrich Periodicals, EBSCO HOST, CSA, CAB Abstract, and DOAJ). *Frequency of publication:* *IJAREM* is published as monthly journal with 12 issues per year. Special editions are also planned subjected to the scope and need. Currently * IJAREM* is also publishing peer reviewed papers of International and National level conferences conducted by various research and academic institutions. *Paper Submission:* Authors are invited to submit papers for this journal using Online Submission System through following link http://www.ijarem.org/online-submission.html or email at editor@ijarem.org Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this Journal. For information about Journal scope, review process, publication charges and policies please visit www.ijarem.org Kindly forward this e-mail to your group of Friends/ Students/ Colleagues/ Associates/ Fellow Researchers, who may be benefited out of this. Thanking You. *Best Regards, * *Editorial Board, * *IJAREM,* *ISSN: 2456-2033* *http://www.ijarem.org * *You may unsubscribe to stop receiving our emails.*

International Journal of

Advanced Research in Engineering & Management (IJAREM)

 

We Publish Research Papers 

 

(ISSN: 2456-2033)
 
Dear Researcher,
International Journal of Advanced Research in Engineering & Management (IJAREM) is an International peer reviewed, open access, Engineering and Science Journal promoting the discovery, innovation, advancement and dissemination of basic and transitional knowledge in engineering, science and related disciplines. We aim to revolutionize industry by promoting legitimate and effective research.

We welcome original research articles/manuscripts as long as their research questions are important, new, and relevant to general readers and their designs are appropriate and robust. 
 
IJAREM provides individual hard copy of certificates to all authors on demand at their postal address after online publication.

 
Please ensure submitted articles conform to the internationally accepted criteria and are prepared in line with IJAREM Author Guidelines. Every research article published in the (IJAREM) is immediately accessible on to everyone.
 

Important dates for Sep 2019, Volume 05 - Issue 09

Last date of paper submission:

20 Sep 2019

Notification of Acceptance

Within 03-04 Days

Publication date:

Within 05-07 Days after registration

 
Why publishing with The IJAREM?
   All articles published in the journals are open access: Universally accessible online without charge.
  Easy submission and peer-review makes the whole process of publishing your article simple and efficient.
  High visibility for your work: Anyone with internet access can read or your download.
  Professional formatting and reviewing meets the standards expected by authors and worldwide research community.
  IJAREM index all published papers in worldwide indexing (Google Scholar, Ulrich Periodicals, EBSCO HOST, CSA, CAB Abstract, and DOAJ).

 

Frequency of publication:

IJAREM is published as monthly journal with 12 issues per year. Special editions are also planned subjected to the scope and need. Currently IJAREM is also publishing peer reviewed papers of International and National level conferences conducted by various research and academic institutions. 

 

Paper Submission:

Authors are invited to submit papers for this journal using Online Submission System through following link http://www.ijarem.org/online-submission.html or email at editor@ijarem.org

 

Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this Journal.

 

For information about Journal scope, review process, publication charges and policies please visit www.ijarem.org

 
Kindly forward this e-mail to your group of Friends/ Students/ Colleagues/ Associates/ Fellow Researchers, who may be benefited out of this.
 


Thanking You.

 

 

Best Regards, 
Editorial Board, 
IJAREM,

ISSN: 2456-2033

http://www.ijarem.org




You may unsubscribe to stop receiving our emails.
